content.html: And she hadn't played the role since 2015 😱 Y'all IMAGINE being able to casually step into one of the most vocally demanding roles on BroadWAY, AND being able to do bubble sort. I--?!?? Ma'am, we are not WORTHY!! 🙇‍♀️🛐🙏🙌 @sticklercarla is an absolute ICON.
